Name: 127mm AR-15 Barrel 5.56x45
Description: Designed for AR-15 rifles, this 127mm ultra-short barrel is compatible with weapons chambered in 5.56x45 NATO. You can often see strange variants of AR15s with extremely short barrels and short handguards, or short barrels with extended handguards, in many places. Some people opt for these models for their practicality, while others use them to satisfy various modification hobbies.
